data.comment: The first-half is in progress. Alkmaar get the game underway.
Mike Van Duinen (Zwolle) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 17, Calvin Stengs (Alkmaar) sees red and is sent off in Alkmaar!
Zwolle make their first substitution with Mustafa Saymak replacing Clint Leemans.
The away team replace Reza Ghoochannejhad with Eliano Reijnders.
In the minute 63, Tijani Reijnders is replacing Albert Gudmundsson for the home team.
Myron Boadu is on target to level the scores at 1-1.
The home team have replaced Pantelis Chatzidiakos with Ferdy Druijf. This is the second substitution made today by Arne Slot.
In the minute 71, Zwolle's Bram Van Polen has been booked in Alkmaar.
Thomas Lam (Zwolle) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Manuel Pherai is on a sub for Jesper Drost for Zwolle.
In the minute 76, Yuta Nakayama is replacing Dean Huiberts for Zwolle at AFAS Stadion.
Thomas Lam (Zwolle) has been sent off!
Jonas Svensson (Alkmaar) gets a yellow card.
Yuta Nakayama is booked for the away team.
